curriculum.name: Fine Arts
curriculum.description: The expression of imagination through music, art, movement, & dramatic play.

curriculum.name: Math
curriculum.description: A systematic standardized language designed to describe, measure, compare, & show relationships.

curriculum.name: Health
curriculum.description: Improving the physical & mental well-being of individuals & communities by increasing their knowledge or influencing their attitudes.

curriculum.name: Science
curriculum.description: The study of the world & beyond, the living & non-living inhabitants, & their interaction within their habitats.

curriculum.name: Social Emotional
curriculum.description: Learning to understand & manage emotions, & achieve positive goals.

curriculum.name: Social Studies
curriculum.description: An integrated field of study that draws upon many disciplines, including economics, geography, & history.

curriculum.name: Animals
curriculum.description: A living thing that is not a human being or a plant.

curriculum.name: Engineering
curriculum.description: The process of inventing, designing, & developing the tools we use in society.

curriculum.name: Spanish
curriculum.description: The language of Spain, Mexico, and many countries in Latin America.

curriculum.name: Dance
curriculum.description: The art of moving the body and feet in a rhythmic way and usually in time to music.

curriculum.name: Music
curriculum.description: The art of sequencing & combining a succession of sounds in time so they produce a composition having unity.

curriculum.name: Nutrition
curriculum.description: Understanding the importance of a healthy diet & eating habits and incorporating these habits into daily routines.
